author: Christina Farr
title: Biologist Carl Bergstrom on COVID-19, misinformation and why we weren't prepared
description: There are a lot of information gaps when it comes to the COVID-19 coronavirus virus. University of Washington professor Carl Bergstrom is one of the scientists desperately trying to fill those gaps.
content:
Carl Bergstrom is an infectious disease expert who's been thinking about the relationship between biology and social systems. One central theme in his work is information: How it flows and how it spreads. 
At the University of Washington, where he lectures, … [+10744 chars]
